TestCase.name: testAntiJoinRightIsEmpty
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 WHERE a NOT IN (SELECT d FROM T2 WHERE 1=0)

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[NOT(IN($0, { LogicalProject(select=[d]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) }))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])
LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])

TestCase.name: testEmptyFilterProjectUnion
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM (VALUES (10, 1), (30, 3)) AS T (x, y) UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (VALUES (20, 2)) ) WHERE x + y > 30

LogicalProject(select=[x, y]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(+($0, $1), 30)]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[x, y]) : +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 10, 1 }, { 30, 3 }]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 20, 2 }]])
LogicalProject(select=[x, y]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 30, 3 }]])

TestCase.name: testEmptyFilterProjectUnion2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM (VALUES (10, 1), (30, 3), (30, 3)) AS T (X, Y) UNION SELECT * FROM (VALUES (20, 2)) ) WHERE X + Y > 30

LogicalProject(select=[X, Y]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(+($0, $1), 30)]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(select=[X, Y]) : +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 10, 1 }, { 30, 3 }, { 30, 3 }]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 20, 2 }]])
LogicalProject(select=[X, Y]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 30, 3 }, { 30, 3 }]])

TestCase.name: testEmptyIntersect
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (VALUES (30, 3)) INTERSECT SELECT * FROM (VALUES (10, 1), (30, 3)) AS T (x, y) WHERE x > 50 INTERSECT SELECT * FROM (VALUES (30, 3))

LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) :- LogicalIntersect(all=[false]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) : : +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 30, 3 }]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[x, y]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 50)]) : +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 10, 1 }, { 30, 3 }]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 30, 3 }]])
LogicalValues(tuples=[[]])

TestCase.name: testEmptyMinus
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (VALUES (30, 3)) AS T (x, y) WHERE x > 30 EXCEPT SELECT * FROM (VALUES (20, 2)) EXCEPT SELECT * FROM (VALUES (40, 4))

LogicalMinus(all=[false]) :- LogicalMinus(all=[false]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[x, y]) : : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 30)]) : : +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 30, 3 }]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) : +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 20, 2 }]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 40, 4 }]])
LogicalValues(tuples=[[]])

TestCase.name: testEmptyMinus2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (VALUES (30, 3)) AS T (x, y) EXCEPT SELECT * FROM (VALUES (20, 2)) AS T (x, y) WHERE x > 30 EXCEPT SELECT * FROM (VALUES (40, 4)) EXCEPT SELECT * FROM (VALUES (50, 5)) AS T (x, y) WHERE x > 50

LogicalMinus(all=[false]) :- LogicalMinus(all=[false]) : :- LogicalMinus(all=[false]) : : :- LogicalProject(select=[x, y]) : : : +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 30, 3 }]]) : : +- LogicalProject(select=[x, y]) : : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 30)]) : : +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 20, 2 }]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) : +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 40, 4 }]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[x, y]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 50)]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 50, 5 }]])
LogicalMinus(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(select=[x, y]) : +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 30, 3 }]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[EXPR$0, EXPR$1]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 40, 4 }]])

TestCase.name: testEmptyMinus3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (VALUES (30, 3), (30, 3)) AS T (X, Y) EXCEPT SELECT * FROM (VALUES (20, 2)) AS T (X, Y) WHERE X > 30

LogicalMinus(all=[false]) :- LogicalProject(select=[X, Y]) : +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 30, 3 }, { 30, 3 }]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[X, Y]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 30)]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 20, 2 }]])
LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}]) +- LogicalProject(select=[X, Y]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[{ 30, 3 }, { 30, 3 }]])

TestCase.name: testSemiJoinRightIsEmpty
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 WHERE a IN (SELECT d FROM T2 WHERE 1=0)

LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IN($0, { LogicalProject(select=[d]) LogicalFilter(condition=[=(1, 0)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) })]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]])
LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalValues(tuples=[[]])
